author: rmuir
msg: LUCENE-4805: running some tests sometimes ignores the whole test

author: rjollos
msg: Refs #412: Highlight table rows on hover-over.

author: rhuijben
msg: Make svn_wc__db_scan_addition() avoid a few db queries in case some output
arguments are null. While not reducing the number of database transactions,
it should certainly avoid spending cpu cycles.
(scan_addition_txn): Don't obtain moved paths when we only need the status.
Reset statement on error condition. Don't search for first BASE ancestor
if we don't need it for output argument calculation.

author: andys
msg: TRINIDAD-2360 Size of the pop-up window does not honor the width and height parameters provided in IE
If both width and height are specified, honor them (and avoid any auto-sizing).
